mapper.select: SELECT ch.*, c.id c_id, c.name c_name, c.amount c_amount, c.min_point c_min_point, c.platform c_platform, c.start_time c_start_time, c.end_time c_end_time, c.note c_note, c.use_type c_use_type, c.type c_type, cpr.id cpr_id,cpr.product_id cpr_product_id, cpcr.id cpcr_id,cpcr.product_category_id cpcr_product_category_id FROM sms_coupon_history ch LEFT JOIN sms_coupon c ON ch.coupon_id = c.id LEFT JOIN sms_coupon_product_relation cpr ON cpr.coupon_id = c.id LEFT JOIN sms_coupon_product_category_relation cpcr ON cpcr.coupon_id = c.id WHERE ch.member_id = #{memberId} AND ch.use_status = 0
